        Runs the tests specified by the "srcs" of this class. If this rule transitively depends on other java_test() rules, then they will be run separately.

      • hasTestResultFiles

        public boolean hasTestResultFiles()
        Description copied from interface: TestRule
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the files that contain the test results for this rule are present.

        If this method returns true, then TestRule.interpretTestResults(ExecutionContext, boolean) should be able to be called directly.

        Specified by:
        hasTestResultFiles in interface TestRule

      • getTransitiveClasspaths

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<Path> getTransitiveClasspaths()
        Specified by:
        getTransitiveClasspaths in interface HasClasspathEntries
        Returns:
        Classpath entries for this rule and its dependencies. e.g. If the rule represents a java library, then these entries will be passed to javac's -classpath flag in order to build a jar associated with this rule.

      • getTransitiveClasspathDeps

      • getImmediateClasspaths

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<Path> getImmediateClasspaths()
        Description copied from interface: HasClasspathEntries
        Returns the classpaths for only this rule, not its deps. Used to generate the value of HasClasspathEntries.getTransitiveClasspaths().
        Specified by:
        getImmediateClasspaths in interface HasClasspathEntries

      • getOutputClasspaths

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<Path> getOutputClasspaths()
        Specified by:
        getOutputClasspaths in interface HasClasspathEntries
        Returns:
        Classpath entries that this rule will contribute when it is used as a dependency. e.g. If the rule represents a java library, then these entries must be passed to javac's -classpath flag in order to compile rules that depend on this rule. This is a superset of getImmediateClasspaths which also contains the classpath entries of any exported deps.

      • getExportedDeps

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSortedSet<BuildRule> getExportedDeps()
        Specified by:
        getExportedDeps in interface ExportDependencies

        Returns:

        public boolean supportsStreamingTests()
        Specified by:
        supportsStreamingTests in interface TestRule
        Returns:
